Key Match Events: Mohammad Nawaz tried to hit Evans over mid-off and found Craig Ervine
Shaheen Shah Afridi run out (Sikandar Raza/†Chakabva)
Sikandar Raza dismissed Haider Ali lbw
Brad Evans had 11 runs to defend of the last over and he conceded nine
Mohammad Nawaz flicked it over deep fine for a six
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan have included an extra seamer in Mohammed Wasim and left out Asif Ali

Zimbabwe have made one change to the XI that took a point off South Africa but it's not the one you think. Richard Ngarava, who slipped and fell on the Hobart pitch, is fit. Tendai Chatara is out and Brad Evans gets a game.
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Ervine, who almost lost his hand in an accident as a child, held on
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the 24th Match, Group 2 (N), Perth, October 27, 2022, ICC Men’s T20 World Cup
